alert.note: Alert for Southern Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 27 at 3:28PM MST until March 02 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches through Tuesday evening, then an additional 1 to 2 feet Tuesday evening through Thursday morning. Winds gusting as high as 65 mph through Tuesday morning. * WHERE...Southern Mountains. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are expected. Blowing and drifting snow will reduce visibility on exposed ridgelines, including SR-143 to Brian Head. Traction laws may be enacted.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.
